tools.name: DeepChat
tools.description: A fully free desktop smart assistant, with a powerful DeepSeek large model, supporting multi-round conversations, internet search, file uploads, knowledge bases, and more.

tools.name: Quantalogic
tools.description: A ReAct framework for building advanced AI agents. It aims to accelerate the development of powerful, safe, and accessible AI agents.

tools.name: Chatbox
tools.description: A desktop client for multiple cutting-edge LLM models. Cross-platform, supports search providers, custom models, Azure OpenAI, and more.

tools.name: NextChat
tools.description: A cross-platform ChatGPT web UI with PWA support, optimized for conversation, Prompt Library, and plugins. Based on Vercel.

tools.name: Coco AI
tools.description: An open source unified search and productivity tool that searches, summarizes and organizes your digital information.

tools.name: Liubai
tools.description: A note/todo management system within WeChat, where simple tags help with classification, and AI helps with analysis, content creation, summarization and more.

tools.name: Pal
tools.description: A customized chat playground for iOS, integrating multiple LLM models like GPT, DeepSeek, Claude, etc.

tools.name: LibreChat
tools.description: A customizable open-source app for interacting with multiple AI models, including ChatGPT, DeepSeek AI, Claude 3, and more.

tools.name: Lobe Chat
tools.description: An open-source, modern-design AI chat framework supporting multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Claude 3, Gemini, Ollama, Qwen, DeepSeek), knowledge base, multi-modals, and one-click free deployment.

tools.name: PapersGPT
tools.description: A Zotero plugin for improved papers reading and research with ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, DeepSeek, Phi 4, Llama 3.2, Gemma and Mistral.

tools.name: DeepSeek Coder
tools.description: A suite of AI coding models and tools, supporting various programming languages, with outstanding performance in code generation, infilling, and error fixing.

tools.name: RSS Translator
tools.description: Translate RSS feeds into your language.

tools.name: Enconvo
tools.description: The Launcher of the AI era, the entry point for all AI functions, and a thoughtful intelligent assistant.

tools.name: Cherry Studio
tools.description: A powerful desktop AI assistant for producers.

tools.name: ToMemo
tools.description: A phrasebook + clipboard history + keyboard iOS app with integrated AI macromodeling for quick output use in the keyboard.

tools.name: Video Subtitle Master
tools.description: Batch generate subtitles for videos, with the ability to translate subtitles into other languages.

tools.name: Chatworm
tools.description: A webapp for multiple cutting-edge LLM models, open-source and also available on Android.

tools.name: Easydict
tools.description: A concise and easy-to-use translation dictionary macOS App that allows you to easily and elegantly look up words or translate text.

tools.name: Raycast
tools.description: A productivity tool for macOS that lets you control your tools with a few keystrokes. It supports various extensions including DeepSeek AI.

tools.name: Nice Prompt
tools.description: Organize, share and use your prompts in your code editor, with Cursor and VSCode.

tools.name: PHP Client
tools.description: Deepseek PHP Client is a robust and community-driven PHP client library for seamless integration with the Deepseek API.

tools.name: DeepSwiftSeek
tools.description: A lightweight yet powerful Swift client library with good integration with the DeepSeek API. It provides easy-to-use Swift concurrency for chat, streaming, FIM completions, and more.

tools.name: Laravel Integration
tools.description: Laravel wrapper for Deepseek PHP client, for seamless Deepseek API integration with Laravel applications.

tools.name: Zotero
tools.description: A free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, annotate, cite, and share research.

tools.name: SiYuan
tools.description: A privacy-first personal knowledge management system that supports complete offline usage, as well as end-to-end encrypted data sync.

tools.name: go-stock
tools.description: A Chinese stock data viewer built by Wails with NativeUI and powered by LLM.

tools.name: Wordware
tools.description: A toolkit that enables anyone to build, iterate, and deploy their AI stack with just natural language.

tools.name: Dify
tools.description: An LLM application development platform that supports DeepSeek models for creating assistants, workflows, text generators, and more.

tools.name: Big-AGI
tools.description: A groundbreaking AI suite designed to democratize access to advanced artificial intelligence for everyone.

tools.name: LiberSonora
tools.description: An AI-powered, robust, open-source audiobook toolkit that includes features like intelligent subtitle extraction, AI title generation, multilingual translation, with support for GPU acceleration and batch offline processing.

tools.name: Bob
tools.description: A macOS translation & OCR tool ready to use in any app — right out of the box!

tools.name: AgenticFlow
tools.description: A no-code platform where marketers build agentic AI workflows for go-to-market automation, powered by hundreds of everyday apps as tools for your AI agents.

tools.name: STranslate
tools.description: A ready-to-go translation OCR tool developed by WPF for Windows.

tools.name: ASP Client
tools.description: A lightweight ASP.NET wrapper for the Deepseek AI API, designed to simplify AI-driven text processing in .NET applications.

tools.name: GPT AI Flow
tools.description: The ultimate productivity weapon built by engineers for efficiency enthusiasts, with features like desktop intelligent hub, local encrypted storage, and custom instruction engine.

tools.name: Story-Flicks
tools.description: With just one sentence, you can quickly generate high-definition story short videos, supporting models such as DeepSeek.

tools.name: 16x Prompt
tools.description: An AI coding tool with context management. It helps developers manage source code context and craft prompts for complex coding tasks on existing codebases.

tools.name: Alpha Pai
tools.description: AI Research Assistant / The Next-Generation Financial Information Portal Driven by AI. Proxy for investors to attend meetings and take notes, as well as providing search and Q&A services for financial information and quantitative analysis for investment research.

tools.name: argo
tools.description: Locally download and run Ollama and Huggingface models with RAG on Mac/Windows/Linux. Support LLM API too.

tools.name: PeterCat
tools.description: A conversational Q&A agent configuration system, self-hosted deployment solutions, and a convenient all-in-one application SDK, allowing you to create intelligent Q&A bots for your GitHub repositories.

tools.name: FastGPT
tools.description: An open-source AI knowledge base platform built on large language models (LLMs), supporting various models including DeepSeek and OpenAI. Provides out-of-the-box capabilities for data processing, model invocation, RAG retrieval, and visual AI workflow orchestration.

tools.name: RuZhi AI Notes
tools.description: RuZhi AI Notes is an intelligent knowledge management tool powered by AI, providing one-stop knowledge management and application services including AI search & exploration, AI results to notes conversion, note management & organization, knowledge presentation & sharing. Integrated with DeepSeek model to provide more stable and higher quality outputs.

tools.name: Chatgpt-on-Wechat
tools.description: Chatgpt-on-Wechat(CoW) is a flexible chatbot framework that supports seamless integration of multiple LLMs, including DeepSeek, OpenAI, Claude, Qwen, and others, into commonly used platforms or office software such as WeChat Official Accounts, WeCom, Feishu, DingTalk, and websites. It also supports a wide range of custom plugins.

tools.name: Athena
tools.description: The world's first autonomous general AI with advanced cognitive architecture and human-like reasoning capabilities, designed to tackle complex real-world challenges.

tools.name: MaxKB
tools.description: MaxKB is a ready-to-use, flexible RAG Chatbot.

tools.name: TigerGPT
tools.description: TigerGPT is the first financial AI investment assistant of its kind based on OpenAI, developed by Tiger Group. TigerGPT aims to provide intelligent investment decision-making support for investors. On February 18, 2025, TigerGPT officially integrated the DeepSeek-R1 model to provide users with online Q&A services that support deep reasoning.

tools.name: HIX.AI
tools.description: Try DeepSeek for free and enjoy unlimited AI chat on HIX.AI. Use DeepSeek R1 for AI chat, writing, coding & more. Experience next-gen AI chat now!
